name: Rabbit Knight
description:
WELCOME TO RABBIT KNIGHT!

This action-packed platformer planned initially to release in 1986, is the last video game ever published by "Eastwood Games." 

The game features fast-paced action gameplay with various enemies to encounter, boss to fight,  and secrets to uncover!

--------------------------------

CONTROLS:

PRESS f4 to play in full screen

LEFT & RIGHT = Run

Z = Jump

X = Attack

In Air + Down = Sword Fall

Z + Down While grounded = Dodge Roll

X + Up = Secondary Weapon

--------------------------------

ENEMIES:

Green Mushroom:

     This mushroom may do damage to you, but it can not move at all.

Blue Mushroom:

     These Mushrooms have evolved past the green stage and can walk around.

Infected Rabbit:

     These past residents of the Rabbit Kingdom have been infected by mushrooms and are no longer friendly. They will jump from the background and run at Rory at quick speeds.

Spore:

     These spores fall from the sky, watch out as they will create a Blue Mushroom when they touch the ground.

Infected Knight:

     This enemy was once one of Rory’s friends, however, he is no longer himself. The mushrooms have overtaken his body and he is incredibly hostile.

--------------------------------

WARNING:

THIS GAME CONTAINS LOUD NOISES, FLASHING LIGHTS, AND SCARY IMAGERY
